description: JSON Schema for describing actions carried out during liquidhandling

_88transferAction.description: describe an entire transfer action, which is a list of load, unload & parallelTransfer operations that are logically grouped

___children.description: the child actions carried out during this transfer

$eref.description: describe the action of loading or unloading tips

___channels.description: the position(s) to load tips from or drop tips to for each channel.

___head.description: the head to load tips to or unload tips from

___cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

___time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

$eref.description: represents a list of transfers that are carried out simultaneously by a set of channels

___channels.description: the array of channels, indexed by channel number

___cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

___time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

___cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

___time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

_88tipAction.description: describe the action of loading or unloading tips

$eref.description: the location of a well within a liquidhandling robot

___deck_item_id.description: The ID of an item (prior to liquidhandling)

___channels.description: the position(s) to load tips from or drop tips to for each channel.

___head.description: the head to load tips to or unload tips from

___cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

___time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

_88parallelTransfer.description: represents a list of transfers that are carried out simultaneously by a set of channels

$eref.description: Describe a single channel transfer

touchoff.description: whether or not a touchoff is performed

blowout.description: parameters related to a blowout operation

___flow_rate.description: the flow rate for the blowout operation

___volume.description: the volume used for a blowout, if performed

___height.description: the height from which to perform a blowout

___dsp.description: Parameters related to the way in which dispensing was performed

___policy.description: the name of the liquid type for this transfer

___volume.description: the volume of liquid transferred in this operation

___head.description: the head to load tips to or unload tips from

___wasted.description: the volume of liquid wasted in this operation

___asp.description: Parameters related to the way in which aspiration was performed

___to.description: the destination(s) of the transfer, multiple implies multi-dispense

___from.description: the source location of the transfer

___channels.description: the array of channels, indexed by channel number

___cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

___time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

_88liquid.description: Describe a liquid in a plate well

___name.description: The display name of the liquid

$eref.description: A measurement, typically of a Volume

___unit.description: The units in which the measurement is expressed

___total_volume.description: The total volume present of the liquid

___components.description: The sub-components which make up this liquid

___name.description: the display name of the sub-component

___unit.description: the units in which the concentration is expressed

_88promptAction.description: describes an on-screen prompt which waits for user input

___message.description: the message that is shown to the user

___cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

___time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

_88height.description: The height of the end of the tip relative to something

___unit.description: The units in which the height is expressed

$eref.description: describes options about how pipetting was carried out

___liquid_level_follow.description: if true, follow the liquid level during the operation

___mixing.description: summarize the properties of an optional mixing operation

___cycles.description: The number of mix cycles that were carried out

___liquid_level_follow.description: if true, follow the liquid level during the operation

_88waitAction.description: describes an on-screen prompt which waits for user input

___message.description: the (optional) message that is shown to the user while waiting

___duration_seconds.description: how long to wait for, in seconds

___cumulative_time_estimate.description: estimate of total time taken for the run so far after this instruction has completed, in seconds

___time_estimate.description: estimate of time taken for this instruction, in seconds

_88wellLocation.description: the location of a well within a liquidhandling robot

___deck_item_id.description: The ID of an item (prior to liquidhandling)

_88contentUpdate.description: updates the contents of a well
